attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Make a difference to small businesses by removing a new stealth tax.

If the levied VAT rate is to fall by 2.5% from 17.5% to 15% for one year then also lower the flat rate repayment rate by the same amount. 

Failure to do so represents a 2.5% tax increase to business below the £150,000 turn over threshold.

rejection.details: Your title should be a clear call for action, preferably starting with a verb, and not a name or statement.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
